Package game.actors.enemies

Class ForestWatcher

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.enemies.Enemy
game.actors.enemies.ForestWatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, DropAction, Follow
public class ForestWatcher
extends Enemy
implements Follow
A class representing a Forest Watcher enemy in the game. Forest Watchers have the ability to switch weather and follow hostile actors. They can drop runes upon defeat and change the ground to a locked gate. Authored by:

    • unconscious

      public java.lang.String unconscious​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map)
      Executed when the ForestWatcher becomes unconscious due to the action of another actor. This method sets the weather to normal, creates a LockedGate ground with specified destinations, drops an item at the ForestWatcher's location, and removes the ForestWatcher from the map.
      Overrides:
      unconscious in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor responsible for the ForestWatcher becoming unconscious.
      map - The game map containing the ForestWatcher.
      Returns:
      A string describing the event when the ForestWatcher becomes unconscious.

      Add a following behaviour to the Forest Watcher.
      Specified by:
      followBehaviour in interface Follow
      Parameters:
      followTarget - The actor to follow.
